spells.name: Elemental Speech
spells.description: Enables you to speak to elementals and some creatures.

spells.name: Elemental Touch
spells.description: Gain energy damage touch attack.

spells.name: Resist Energy
spells.description: Ignores first 10 (or more) points of damage per attack from specified energy type.

spells.name: Summon Monster II
spells.description: Summons elemental creature.

spells.name: Glide
spells.description: No fall damage, move 60 ft./round while falling.

spells.name: Gust of Wind
spells.description: Blast of wind blows away or knocks down creatures.

spells.name: Levitate
spells.description: Subject moves up and down at your direction.

spells.name: Whispering Wind
spells.description: Sends a short message 1 mile/level.

spells.name: Acid Arrow
spells.description: Ranged touch attack; 2d4 damage for 1 round + 1 round/3 levels.

spells.name: Create Pit
spells.description: Creates an extradimensional pit.

spells.name: Glitterdust
spells.description: Blinds targets, outlines invisible things.

spells.name: Shatter
spells.description: Sonic energy damages objects or creatures composed of crystal.

spells.name: Stone Call
spells.description: 2d6 damage to all creatures in area.

spells.name: Burning Gaze
spells.description: 1d6 fire damage to target by looking at it.

spells.name: Fire Breath
spells.description: Exhale a cone of flame at will.

spells.name: Flaming Sphere
spells.description: Ball of fire deals 3d6 fire damage.

spells.name: Pyrotechnics
spells.description: Turns fire into light or thick smoke.

spells.name: Scorching Ray
spells.description: Ranged touch attack deals 4d6 fire damage, +1 ray/four levels (max 3).

spells.name: Accelerate Poison
spells.description: Hastens targeted poison's onset.

spells.name: Fog Cloud
spells.description: Fog obscures vision.

spells.name: Slipstream
spells.description: Wave boosts creature's speed.
